title: #201: Forensically Deconstructing Mindhunter Season 2
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa analyse and forensically deconstruct the long awaited Mindhunter Season 2: the victims, the killers, the profilers, the BAUs, how the show has been constructed, the casting, the wallpaper, the blouses, the book and so much more. You won't want to miss this!


#Mindhunter
